data.title: M Countdown
data.meta_description: M Countdown (엠카운트다운) is a weekly music show broadcast by Mnet. It airs live every Thursday at 18:00 KST. Website Facebook Twitter
data.text:
M Countdown (엠카운트다운) is a weekly music show broadcast by Mnet. It airs live every Thursday at 18:00 KST.

MCs[]

Name(s) Duration Kangin November 2005 – August 2007 Leeteuk & Shindong November 2005 – March 27, 2008 Eunhyuk August 16, 2007 – March 27, 2008 Nichkhun, Junho, Chansung, Jo Kwon, Jeong Jinwoon, Kang Min Hyuk, Lee Joon & G.O February 18, 2010 – 2010 Tony An & Shin So Yul March 10, 2011 – August 23, 2012 Lee Hong Gi August 30, 2012 – December 13, 2012 Kim Woo Bin August 15, 2013 – February 13, 2014 Ahn Jae Hyun & Jung Joon Young February 27, 2014 – November 20, 2014 BamBam & Park Jin Young March 19, 2015 – March 3, 2016 Lee Jung Shin March 19, 2015 – September 8, 2016 Key March 19, 2015 – April 13, 2017 Lee Dae Hwi & Han Hyun Min April 4, 2019 – February 4, 2021[1] Nam Yoon Su February 18, 2021 – January 19, 2023 Joohoney February 23, 2023[2] – July 20, 2023[3] Miyeon February 18, 2021 – November 16, 2023[4][5] Sung Han Bin September 7, 2023 – present[6] Sohee & Myung Jaehyun January 11, 2024 – present[7]
